member.summary: Automatic page segmentation, but no OSD, or OCR.

member.summary: Fully automatic page segmentation, but no OSD. (Default)

member.name: F:Waher.WebService.Tesseract.PageSegmentationMode.SingleColumnOfText
member.summary: Assume a single column of text of variable sizes.

member.summary: Assume a single uniform block of vertically aligned text.

member.name: F:Waher.WebService.Tesseract.PageSegmentationMode.SingleUniformBlockOfText
member.summary: Assume a single uniform block of text.

member.name: F:Waher.WebService.Tesseract.PageSegmentationMode.SingleLineOfText
member.summary: Treat the image as a single text line.

member.summary: Treat the image as a single word.

member.summary: Treat the image as a single word in a circle.

member.name: F:Waher.WebService.Tesseract.PageSegmentationMode.SingleCharacter
member.summary: Treat the image as a single character.

member.summary: Class providing a web API for OCR using Tesseract, installed on the server.

member.name: M:Waher.WebService.Tesseract.TesseractApi.SetInstallationPaths(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the installation folder of Tesseract.
member.exception: If trying to set the installation folder to a different folder than the one set previously. The folder can only be set once, for security reasons.
